MushroomForest

Class RenderInstance

  • java.lang.Object
    • MushroomForest.RenderInstance
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.lwjgl.util.Renderable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Butterfly, Mushroom

    public class RenderInstance
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.lwjgl.util.Renderable
    This class encapsulates a render instance.
    Author:
    Jedd Morgan

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Colour getColour() 
      int getDisplayListIndex() 
      org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector3f getPosition() 
      org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector3f getRotation()

      org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector3f getScale() 
      org.newdawn.slick.opengl.Texture getTexture() 
      void render()
      Called once a frame

      Calls the rendering of the displayList specified displayListIndex with the specified position, rotation, scale, colour and texture
      If texture is null then no texture will be drawn.

      This method should be called between
      GL11.glPushMatrix and GL11.glPopMatrix method calls
      void setColour(Colour colour) 
      void setDisplayListIndex(int displayListIndex) 
      void setPosition(org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector3f position)

      void setRotationOrigin(org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector3f rotationOrigin) 
      void setScale(float scale) 
      void setScale(org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector3f scale) 
      void setTexture(org.newdawn.slick.opengl.Texture texture) 
      void update(float animationScale)
      Update method is called every frame
      This method is designed to be overridden by sub classes

    • Constructor Detail

      • RenderInstance

        public RenderInstance(int displayListIndex,
                      org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector3f position)
        Parameters:
        displayListIndex - - Index of the model that should be drawn when this RenderInstance is rendered ( render )
        position - - The world position of this RenderInstance

      • RenderInstance

        public RenderInstance(int displayListIndex,
                      org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector3f position,
                      org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector3f rotation,
                      org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector3f rotationOrigin,
                      org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector3f scale,
                      Colour colour,
                      java.lang.Boolean disableLighting,
                      @Nullable org.newdawn.slick.opengl.Texture texture,
                      @Nullable RenderInstance[] children)
        Parameters:
        displayListIndex - - Index of the model that should be drawn when this RenderInstance is rendered ( render )
        position - - The translation that should be applied on render
        rotationOrigin - - The origin of the rotation ( if null the position will be used as origin )
        rotation - - The rotation that should be applied on render
        scale - - The scale that should be applied on render
        colour - - The colour that should be applied
        disableLighting - - if lighting should be disable for this object
        texture - - The texture that should be drawn (if null, no texture will be applied)
        children - - Array of nested RenderInstances

      • update

        public void update(float animationScale)
        Update method is called every frame
        This method is designed to be overridden by sub classes
        Parameters:
        animationScale - - the animationScale

      • render

        public void render()
        Called once a frame

        Calls the rendering of the displayList specified displayListIndex with the specified position, rotation, scale, colour and texture
        If texture is null then no texture will be drawn.

        This method should be called between
        GL11.glPushMatrix and GL11.glPopMatrix method calls
        Specified by:
        render in interface org.lwjgl.util.Renderable
